LanguageData.AncientBarrel.label: ancient barrel
LanguageData.AncientBarrel.description: An ancient, broken barrel that looks like it once contained waste of some sort. The only thing it contains now is a smear of dried sludge.
LanguageData.AncientBasicRecharger.label: ancient basic recharger
LanguageData.AncientBasicRecharger.description: An ancient basic recharger. Valuable parts are missing, and everything else is degraded to uselessness.
LanguageData.AncientBed.label: ancient bed
LanguageData.AncientBed.description: An old, rotted mattress on a rusty frame. Though uncomfortable, it can still be used, but it's too dilapidated to restore.
LanguageData.AncientCrate.label: ancient crate
LanguageData.AncientCrate.description: An ancient, broken crate. Any valuables it once contained have degraded to uselessness.
LanguageData.AncientDisplayBank.label: ancient display bank
LanguageData.AncientDisplayBank.description: An ancient computer interface. Valuable parts are missing, and everything else is degraded to uselessness.
LanguageData.AncientEquipmentBlocks.label: ancient equipment blocks
LanguageData.AncientEquipmentBlocks.description: A collection of ancient equipment blocks of unknown function. Valuable parts are missing, and everything else is degraded to uselessness.
LanguageData.AncientGenerator.label: ancient generator
LanguageData.AncientGenerator.description: An ancient electrical generator. Its usable parts were smashed or looted long ago, and the rest has rusted into uselessness.
LanguageData.AncientKitchenSink.label: ancient kitchen sink
LanguageData.AncientKitchenSink.description: An ancient kitchen sink made of some non-metallic fiber-sheet material. It is badly deteriorated and there's no way to salvage anything from it.\n\nHow it got here must be a long story.
LanguageData.AncientLamp.label: старовинна лампа
LanguageData.AncientLamp.description: Старовинна лампа з автономним живленням. Її акумулятор сильно виснажений, але вона все ще випромінює слабке освітлення.
LanguageData.AncientLargeMechGestator.label: ancient large mech gestator
LanguageData.AncientLargeMechGestator.description: An ancient large mech gestator. Valuable parts are missing, and everything else is degraded to uselessness.
LanguageData.AncientLockerBank.label: ancient locker bank
LanguageData.AncientLockerBank.description: An ancient, rusted bank of lockers. All of the lockers have been forced open with nothing valuable left behind.
LanguageData.AncientMachine.label: ancient machine
LanguageData.AncientMachine.description: A large ancient machine case filled with unknown machinery. Valuable parts are missing, and everything else is degraded to uselessness.
LanguageData.AncientMechDropBeacon.label: ancient mech drop beacon
LanguageData.AncientMechDropBeacon.description: The broken shell of a mech drop beacon. Its useful components are missing and the shell has deteriorated after many years.
LanguageData.AncientMechGestator.label: ancient mech gestator
LanguageData.AncientMechGestator.description: An ancient mech gestator. Valuable parts are missing, and everything else is degraded to uselessness.
LanguageData.AncientMechGestatorTank.label: ancient mech vat
LanguageData.AncientMechGestatorTank.description: An ancient device capable of forming new mechanoids, and sustaining injured mechanoids while they rejuvenate.
LanguageData.AncientMechGestatorTank.comps.CompMechGe: A {0_labelShort} has emerged from a mech vat.
LanguageData.AncientMicrowave.label: ancient microwave
LanguageData.AncientMicrowave.description: An ancient device for heating food. Smashed and rusted, it is completely useless now.\n\nHow it got here is hard to say.
LanguageData.AncientMilitaryCrate.label: ancient military crate
LanguageData.AncientMilitaryCrate.description: An ancient, military-looking crate. It was broken long ago and any valuables it once contained were looted.
LanguageData.AncientOperatingTable.label: ancient operating table
LanguageData.AncientOperatingTable.description: A table once used for surgical operations. It has long since deteriorated into uselessness.
LanguageData.AncientOven.label: ancient oven
LanguageData.AncientOven.description: An ancient oven. Smashed and rusted, it is completely useless now.\n\nHow it got here is hard to say.
LanguageData.AncientRefrigerator.label: ancient refrigerator
LanguageData.AncientRefrigerator.description: An ancient refrigerator. It was stripped of interesting parts long ago.
LanguageData.AncientSecurityTurret.label: ancient security turret
LanguageData.AncientSecurityTurret.description: An ancient, broken security turret. The valuable parts have all been looted or smashed.
LanguageData.AncientSpacerCrate.label: ancient spacer crate
LanguageData.AncientSpacerCrate.description: An ancient, broken crate. Any valuables it once contained were taken long ago.
LanguageData.AncientStandardRecharger.label: ancient standard recharger
LanguageData.AncientStandardRecharger.description: An ancient standard recharger. Valuable parts are missing, and everything else is degraded to uselessness.
LanguageData.AncientStorageCylinder.label: ancient storage cylinder
LanguageData.AncientStorageCylinder.description: An ancient device that looks like it once stored some kind of fluid. Valuable parts are missing, and everything else is degraded to uselessness.
LanguageData.AncientStove.label: ancient stove
LanguageData.AncientStove.description: An old stove. Smashed and rusted, it is now completely useless.
LanguageData.AncientSystemRack.label: ancient system rack
LanguageData.AncientSystemRack.description: An ancient rack unit packed with unidentifiable devices. Valuable parts are missing, and everything else is degraded to uselessness.
